title: Conditioned Media
subtitle: Conditioned Media Proteomics Analysis
description: Analyze secreted proteins and exosome proteomes in cell culture supernatants (conditioned media). Provide specialized proteomics solutions for cell-cell signaling, tumor microenvironment, and extracellular vesicle research.

features.title: Secretome Profiling
features.description: Comprehensively identify proteins, growth factors, and cytokines secreted by cells. Understand cell-cell communication and microenvironment interactions.

features.title: Exosome Proteomics
features.description: Analyze protein cargo within extracellular vesicles (exosomes, microvesicles). Apply to disease mechanisms, biomarker discovery, and therapeutic target identification.

features.title: Therapeutics Development Support
features.description: Monitor recombinant protein production, cell therapy quality control, and biopharmaceutical development. Support culture condition optimization and product characterization.
